alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued May 28 at 3:19PM MDT until May 28 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A Red Flag Warning remains in effect until 10 PM today for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 222 through 224, and 226 through 237, which includes the Interstate 25 corridor eastward across the plains as well as Fremont County below 8000 feet, in addition to the Eastern San Juan Mountains, the La Garita Mountains, and the San Luis Valley... ...A Red Flag Warning is now in effect for Sunday from 11 AM until 9 PM for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather Zones 222, 224 and 226 through 237...which includes all of the plains, Fremont county below 8000 feet and the San Luis Valley... ...A Fire Weather Watch has been issued for late Monday morning through Monday evening for gusty winds and low relative humidity for Fire Weather zones 222, 224, and 227 through 237 which includes Fremont county below 8000 feet, the San Luis Valley, southern El Paso county and all of the southeast plains... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 PM MDT THIS EVENING FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... ...RED FLAG WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM TO 9 PM MDT SUNDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONE 226... * Affected Area...Fire Weather Zone 226. * Winds...West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 35 mph. * Relative Humidity...As low as 10 percent. * Impacts...Conditions will be favorable for rapid rates of fire growth and spread. * Lightning...Isolated cloud to ground lightning flashes will be possible tomorrow afternoon over El Paso county.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County Including Monument and Black Forest
